item.title: [718] Virtus | Like you have never seen before
item.dc:creator: @k0ed_ur_mom k0ed ur mom
item.description:
@k0ed_ur_mom wrote:

3/23-3/24
Fixed Iron Man accounts being able to receive drop trades from other players.
Added Bow Strings to fletching shop.
Fixed all auras requiring VIP Donator status. (Only Wisdom requires this now)
Fixed NPC drops lasting FOREVER.
Fixed the spawning of trees and ores.
Removed requirement of 1000 runite ores mined for Completionist’s cape until spawning is fixed.
Made Pest Invasion completion a requirement for the Completionist’s cape (t).
Added a world message when someone dies in Hardcore Ironman Mode.
XP lamps have been altered to give larger amounts experience.
Some new Trivia questions have been added
The Sunfreet boss teleport now takes you to a different location to battle the Sunfreet.
Cutting Yew trees, and ivy have been speed up slightly.
The skilling interface for has been fixed to show the item you will be making.

Read full topic
item.source: [718] Virtus | Like you have never seen before

item.title: [718] Virtus | Like you have never seen before
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

nolan2131:

An intelligent person can read the information he’s provided us with along with the media. If he has something unique, show it. I’d expect you to be able to tell the difference in normal bullshit spammed in the Advertisement threads everyday as opposed to something that’s actually different.

None of what he said in his reply was unique. His original post didn’t have anything different from any other server so I was curious if he had missed something out that I wasn’t seeing, because what he has put up doesn’t show anything unique.

Read full topic
item.source: [718] Virtus | Like you have never seen before

item.title: [718] Virtus | Like you have never seen before
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

Welliton_inc:

Stop saying silly things like “Like you have never seen before” when you don’t even explain what we haven’t seen on a server…

An intelligent person can read the information he’s provided us with along with the media. If he has something unique, show it. I’d expect you to be able to tell the difference in normal bullshit spammed in the Advertisement threads everyday as opposed to something that’s actually different.

[quote=“k0ed ur mom, post:7, topic:550507”]You can start with 120 capes with particles. Then moving to the 831 model decoder that allows us to load 831 revision items. Next you will see Vorago, who is fully coded with 5 stages of combat. Next is the player based grand exchange. Though this is becoming more popular and in more servers, it is still different. Even further would be social slayer, and bank pins to secure your items. The bank pins are required for money pouch, grand exchange (collection also), and the bank.

I hope I helped you see why we are unique.[/quote]

Every single solitary feature you just provided me with, I’ve seen before and doesn’t impress. Especially social slayer, bank pins, and grand exchange, those are available throughout multiple different revisions nowadays.

Read full topic
item.source: [718] Virtus | Like you have never seen before

item.title: [718] Virtus | Like you have never seen before
item.dc:creator: @k0ed_ur_mom k0ed ur mom
item.description:
@k0ed_ur_mom wrote:

Welliton_inc:

Stop saying silly things like “Like you have never seen before” when you don’t even explain what we haven’t seen on a server…

If you look at the advertisement thread, you can see what we have that others don’t. You can start with 120 capes with particles. Then moving to the 831 model decoder that allows us to load 831 revision items. Next you will see Vorago, who is fully coded with 5 stages of combat. Next is the player based grand exchange. Though this is becoming more popular and in more servers, it is still different. Even further would be social slayer, and bank pins to secure your items. The bank pins are required for money pouch, grand exchange (collection also), and the bank.

I hope I helped you see why we are unique.

Read full topic
item.source: [718] Virtus | Like you have never seen before

item.title: [718] Virtus | Like you have never seen before
item.dc:creator: @k0ed_ur_mom k0ed ur mom
item.description:
@k0ed_ur_mom wrote:

[quote=“Soulcist, post:2, topic:550507”]Fix the BBCODE, I’m assuming you copy and pasted this from Rune-Server or something, looks unprofessional. As for the advertisement, it looks fine; I’m sure it’ll attract some people. Would also like to note that the theme isn’t so bad on the forum, it’s hard to find a nice light theme so props for that.

Good luck[/quote]

You were right, I assumed it would be the same as Rune-servers. I have polished it up. Thank you for the compliment on the forums

item.title: [718] Virtus | Like you have never seen before
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Fix the BBCODE, I’m assuming you copy and pasted this from Rune-Server or something, looks unprofessional. As for the advertisement, it looks fine; I’m sure it’ll attract some people. Would also like to note that the theme isn’t so bad on the forum, it’s hard to find a nice light theme so props for that.

Good luck
